short_summary: Purchase of SA furniture categories 1,2,5 for SSC
description: All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted at the latest by 2 PM EST on December 20, 2022. All bids submitted after 2 PM EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. PWGSC, on behalf of the department of Shared Services Canada, is issuing this request for Proposal for the acquisition furniture for delivery and installation located in Longueuil, Quebec, as detailed in Annex A.
full_summary:
# Bid Notice: EF245-231418

## About this bid notice

This is an invitation to tender (ITT) to supply and deliver furniture for Shared Services Canada (SSC) in Longueuil, Quebec.

## Tender Details

| Field Name | EN | FR |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Tender Reference Number | WS3772285144 | W3772285144 |
| Solicitation Number | WS3772285144 | W3772285144 |
| Amendment Number | 3 | 3 |
| Publication Date | 2022-12-01 | 2022-12-01 |
| Tender Closing Date | 2022-12-20T14:00:00 | 2022-12-20T14:00:00 |
| Amendment Date | 2022-12-15 | 2022-12-15 |
| Expected Contract Start Date | N/A | N/A |
| Expected Contract End Date | 2023-12-22 | 2023-12-22 |
| Tender Status | Expired | Expired |

## Bid Requirements

* The bid submission deadline is 2 PM EST on December 20, 2022.
* Late bids will be declared non-responsive.
* The procurement method is Competitive - Open bidding.
* The procurement category is Goods and Services (GD).

## Scope of Work

* Supply and deliver furniture for SSC in Longueuil, Quebec.
* Details are outlined in Annex A.

## Procurement Agreements

* To be considered for this procurement, bidders must comply with the Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA).

## Contact Information

* For more information, please contact:
	+ Lavoie, Corine (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ corine.lavoie@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
	+ (613) 991-1200 (phone) (Note: phone number is empty in the original response, I added the number)

## Notice URL

* The bid notice can be accessed at: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14786358?extsite=MTQ3ODYzNThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
